name: Women's Health Services
description: We offer confidential sexual-health services for women age 12 and older to help you get healthy and stay healthy. Women's health issues and services provide: - Family planning services - Pregnancy counseling, testing and referral services - Emergency contraception (“morning-after pill”) - Birth control, including Depo-Provera shots or prescriptions for the Pill, patch or ring - Sexually transmitted disease (STi) risk assessment and testing - Diagnosis and treatment of vaginal infections - Pap sm

howToGetIt: APPOINTMENTS are preferred The Women's Clinic is Thursdays from 8 a.m. – 10:45 a.m. To make an appointment call 628-217-6600 to schedule. Drop-ins and same-day appointments are sometimes available
